text: Step into a home that tells a story of revival. Once in need of major work, this property has been meticulously restored by trained restoration specialists, transforming it into a masterpiece that blends modern comforts with timeless charm. Every detail of the restoration speaks to the passion poured into this home: Main Home: The roof was restored and painted, with new gutters. The interior/exterior have been freshly painted. They created a primary suite by combining two bedrooms and restoring the original fur floors. Bathrooms: Completely reimagined with new plumbing and art deco tiles that add a touch of elegance. Kitchen: Upgraded with new flooring, new sink and hardware, updated plumbing, and a new refrigerator. Sunroom: A tranquil space with new floors, walls, windows, and doors, perfect for relaxing or repurposing as a bedroom. Living Room: Reinforced walls and a custom-built bookshelf adds character and functionality. Laundry Room: Thoughtfully enclosed with new walls, flooring, a new door, and washer and dryer. Garage/Workshop: Completely rebuilt (24' x 20') on a concrete foundation, with new roofing, gutters, and electrical. This could be your new workshop, office, or place to securely park. Two Lanais: Revitalized with new steps, railings, and roofs, creating inviting spaces to enjoy the outdoors. The outside is a masterpiece! Fully fenced and framed by a restored rock wall, it features two gated entrances for convenienceone on 20th Ave and one on Railroad Ave. The grounds have been cleared and landscaped with a stunning array of endemic flora, including ginger, hibiscus, citrus trees, breadfruit, gardenias, puakinikini, anthuriums, bougainvillea, and heliconia. The backyard bursts with color, offering a serene escape. This homes story is one of dreams brought to life. From its pine-slatted wood ceilings to its lush surroundings, every inch of this property invites you to imagine your future here.

Hilo Town Tropical Tranquil Retreat. What may look like an ordinary house from the front, is anything but ordinary - it has a secret...or two... At the end of its driveway you will find the unassuming two story home. The exterior is what you would expect: well built with covered parking and a welcoming entry lanai that is surrounded by attractive tropical landscaping. Step inside and you will know this is no ordinary home: you will be immediately greeted by the double height soaring ceilings. Taking it all in, it just gets better. The spacious eat-in kitchen anchors the center of the home on the ground floor, while the lower level bedrooms and bathrooms are situated at the far ends of the house. The primary suite is a treat for the homeowner or that special guest - large, lots of natural light, and a custom ensuite bathroom. The second ground-floor bedroom is no slouch either: large, well lit, and well-appointed. Bedrooms three and four on the upper level are at opposite ends of the home - perfect for privacy and views of HIlo town to Hilo Bay and the Pacific Ocean beyond. The best parts are still to come, including the secrets... The ocean side of the home has a long covered lanai from which you can enjoy morning coffee or look down to the... miniature golf style putting green. Fun! And then there is the real secret. The real secret is the Retreat: a covered, open-air room built just above the babbling brook that flows through the backyard. That's right, the backyard has a freshwater stream. The back of the home is a true sanctuary: small waterfalls, lava rock pools, tropical plants, koi, guppies, and opae 'ai (crawfish or crayfish). The tranquility and privacy are preserved by the beautiful lava rock walls - the perfect backdrop for this true Hawaii naturescape. Did we mention the property has a solar/photovoltaic system for affordable, sustainable electric power? Hilo has few properties like this, and rarely do they become available.

text: Nestled on an elevated lot, this meticulously maintained home exudes elegance and charm. The raised living room, bathed in natural light from expansive windows, provides stunning ocean views and captures the gentle island breezes. Cathedral ceilings, complemented by chandeliers, soffits, and a combination of recessed and indirect lighting, create an inviting ambiance in the living and dining areas. The wood laminate and tile flooring add to the homes practicality and ease of maintenance. The kitchen boasts Corian countertops, top-of-the-line appliances, and a walk-in pantry, perfect for the home chef. The master suite offers ample closet space and a luxurious master bath featuring a spa tub. With 10-foot ceilings throughout, the bedrooms are thoughtfully positioned to ensure privacy. The spacious laundry room connects to an enclosed garage with 15-foot ceilings and built-in storage. Located in Sunrise Ridge, the neighborhood offers underground utilities for unobstructed views and sidewalks for leisurely strolls, making it the perfect setting for your dream home.
